Name: Puzzle Bear
About the game: PUZZLE BEAR Puzzle Bear is an extremely addictive puzzle game in which you have to get each bear to the star. Bears can move along lines, but not between dots. You may rotate the board and with it some of the lines, but not all of them. As you continue, new elements will make levels more and more challenging. Enjoy over 60 new levels!
